directions: Spread the watercress on a platter. Arrange the endive and shallots evenly over the watercress. Scatter the pomegranate seeds over the mixture.
Whisk the lemon juice, lemon zest, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a small bowl; drizzle over the salad immediately before serving.
ingredients: 6 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste
title: Winter Endive Salad
